articles.content: Big Weekend 2020 is Radio 1's first virtual festival, so you know what that means: you don't have to miss a thing! No long toilet queues making you miss your favourite act, or friends dragging you to… [+6227 chars]

articles.title: Eminem announces online listening party for ‘The Marshall Mathers LP’ - NME
articles.description: Eminem has announced that he will be hosting an online listening party for his third studio album, 'The Marshall Mathers LP' next week.
articles.content:
Eminem has announced that he will be hosting an online listening party for his third studio album, ‘The Marshall Mathers LP’ next week.
